overview: "Appropriated audio from motivational tapes and raw hewn video footage of the exploits of two punk girls creating a disturbance in an Ohio Mall (circa 1988) challenge the great society of the American heartland.  A savvy examination of hard-edge adolescent aggression and an attack on "proper" codes of behavior.  The future is yours." -Karyn Riegel, Occularis film series.
title: Skinny Teeth
